title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for any of the integrands f  x −g  x , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGMbGaaGjcVp aabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabgkHiTiaadEgacaaMi8+a aeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaiilaaaa@449D@ g  x −f  x , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGNbGaaGjcVp aabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabgkHiTiaadAgacaaMi8+a aeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaiilaaaa@449D@  f  x −g  x   , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaabdaqaaiaayI W7caWGMbGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabgkHi TiaadEgacaaMi8+aaeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaGjcVd Gaay5bSlaawIa7aiaacYcaaaa@4AE1@ or  g  x −f  x   MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaabdaqaaiaayI W7caWGNbGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabgkHi TiaadAgacaaMi8+aaeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaGjcVd Gaay5bSlaawIa7aaaa@4A31@ in any definite integral. The second point is earned for finding a ∫ dx 3+x =a⋅ln 3+x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGHbWaa8qGbe qaaabaaaaaaaaapeWaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaadsgacaWG4baapaqaa8qa caaIZaGaey4kaSIaamiEaaaaaSWdaeqabeqdcaGLRicak8qacqGH9a qpcaWGHbGaeyyXICTaciiBaiaac6gadaabdaqaaiaaiodacqGHRaWk caWG4baacaGLhWUaayjcSdaaaa@4C68@ or a⋅ln 3+x . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGHbGaeyyXIC neaaaaaaaaa8qaciGGSbGaaiOBamaabmaabaGaaG4maiabgUcaRiaa dIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaGGUaaaaa@4306@

A response is eligible for the third point only if it has earned the first 2 points. The third point is earned only for the correct answer. The answer does not need to be simplified; however, if simplification is attempted, it must be correct.

A response is not eligible for the third point with incorrect limits of integration for u MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG1baaaa@39F5@ -substitution, for example, ∫ 0 3 12 3+x   dx = ∫ 0 3 12 u   du =12 ln x+3  0  3 . title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

To earn the first point a response must correctly use limit notation throughout the problem and not include arithmetic with infinity, for example, − 144 3+x  0  ∞ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aadmaapaqaa8qacWaGgAOeI0YaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaaigdacaaI0aGa aGinaaWdaeaapeGaaG4maiabgUcaRiaadIhaaaaacaGLBbGaayzxaa WdamaaDaaaleaapeGaaGjcVlaaicdaa8aabaWdbiaayIW7jeaWcqGH EisPaaaaaa@48CA@ or − 144 3+∞ +48. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHsislqaaaaa aaaaWdbmaalaaapaqaa8qacaaIXaGaaGinaiaaisdaa8aabaWdbiaa iodacqGHRaWkjaaWcqGHEisPaaGccqGHRaWkcaaI0aGaaGioaiaac6 caaaa@4384@

The second point can be earned by finding an antiderivative of the form − a 3+x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHsisldaWcaa qaaiaadggaaeaadaqadaqaaiaaiodacqGHRaWkcaWG4baacaGLOaGa ayzkaaaaaaaa@3F03@ for a>0, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGHbGaeyOpa4 JaaGimaiaacYcaaaa@3C53@ from an indefinite or improper integral, with or without correct limit notation. If a≠144, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGHbGaeyiyIK RaaGymaiaaisdacaaI0aGaaiilaaaa@3E8F@ the response does not earn the third point.

The third point is earned only for an answer of 48 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaI0aGaaGioaa aa@3A7B@ (or equivalent).

A response is not eligible for the third point with incorrect limits of integration for u MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG1baaaa@39F5@ -substitution, for example, lim b→∞ ∫ 0 b 144 u 2   du= lim b→∞ − 144 3+x  0  b . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWfqaqaaabaaa aaaaaapeGaciiBaiaacMgacaGGTbaal8aabaWdbiaadkgacqGHsgIR jeaWcWaGmAOhIukal8aabeaakmaapeBabeaapeWaaSaaa8aabaWdbi aaigdacaaI0aGaaGinaaWdaeaapeGaamyDa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qa caaIYaaaaaaakiaaykW7caaMc8UaamizaiaadwhacqGH9aqppaWaaC beaeaapeGaciiBaiaacMgacaGGTbaal8aabaWdbiaadkgacqGHsgIR jeaWcWaGmAOhIukal8aabeaak8qadaWadaWdaeaapeGaeyOeI0YaaS aaa8aabaWdbiaaigdacaaI0aGaaGinaaWdaeaapeGaaG4maiabgUca RiaadIhaaaaacaGLBbGaayzxaaWdamaaDaaaleaapeGaaGjcVlaaic daa8aabaWdbiaayIW7caWGIbaaaaWdaeaacGaraIimaaqaaiaadkga a0Gaay5kIaGccaGGUaaaaa@6907@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first and second points are earned with an implied u MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG1baaaa@39F5@ and dv MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGKbGaamODaa aa@3ADF@ in the presence of x⋅f  x − ∫ f  x  dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bGaeyyXIC TaamOzaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGHsisl daWdbaqaaiaadAgacaaMi8+aaeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaa GaaGPaVlaadsgacaWG4baaleqabeqdcqGHRiI8aaaa@4C9E@ or x⋅f  x    0  3 −10. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaabcaqaaiaadI hacqGHflY1caWGMbGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMca aiaayIW7aKaaalaawIa7aOWaa0baaSqaaiaayIW7caaIWaaabaGaaG jcVlaaiodaaaGccqGHsislcaaIXaGaaGimaiaac6caaaa@4D22@

Limits of integration may be present, omitted, or partially present in the work for the first and second points.

The tabular method may be used to show integration by parts.
